scripts.types:check: npm run types:check:backend && npm run types:check:frontend
scripts.types:generate: npm run types:clean && npm run types:generate:shared && npm run types:generate:backend && npm run types:generate:frontend && npm run types:generate:index && npm run types:generate:bridge
scripts.types:refresh: npm run types:generate && npm run types:check
scripts.validate: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run types:refresh
scripts.validate:fix: npm run format:fix && npm run lint:fix && npm run types:refresh
scripts.build: npm run validate && node tools/unified-build.js build
scripts.push:test: npm run switch:env -- test && npm run build && clasp push --force
scripts.push:prod: npm run switch:env -- prod && npm run build && clasp push --force
scripts.deploy:test: npm run push:test && node tools/deploy-update.js "Test deployment"
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run push:prod && node tools/deploy-update.js "Production deployment"
scripts.ai:test: npm run validate:fix && npm run deploy:test
scripts.ai:prod: npm run validate:fix && npm run deploy:prod
